data.title: Heath Ledger & Michelle Williams Split
data.meta_description: OMG I hope not. Anyone heard about them being on the rocks? It's not on People.com yet but US are getting quite good at knowing when people are breaking up...
data.text:
OMG I hope not. Anyone heard about them being on the rocks? It's not on People.com yet but US are getting quite good at knowing when people are breaking up.

Heath Ledger and Michelle Williams have split, Us Weekly can confirm.

A source close to the couple tells Us that Heath and Michelle "quietly and amicably split a few weeks ago."

"The relationship had been rocky recently. They tried very hard to make it work but finally decided to separate. They just grew apart."

The couple, who live in Brooklyn, NY and have a daughter, Mathilda, 23 months, met on the set of Brokeback Mountain in 2005.

"They have a beautiful daughter and they are both committed to being great parents."

Reps for the couple could not be reached.

http://www.usmagazine.com/exclusive_heath_ledger_and_michelle_williams_split

ONTD

if it's true then wow, I didn't see it coming..

people shouldnt have babies that early because when it comes to a breaking up children are the ones who suffer but their child is a baby yet,i mean she wont even understand what's going on around her.

people shouldnt have babies that early because when it comes to a breaking up children are the ones who suffer but their child is a baby yet,i mean she wont even understand what's going on around her.

Unfortunately, she got pregnant only after dating for six months or so. And he just came off a 2 year relationship with Naomi Watts. I loved Heath and Naomi. I was sad when they broke-up. But there have been a lot of rumours of quite a while but Heath and Michelle never spending anytime together anymore. They have a beautiful daughter and hopefully work together as parents.
